name: 蔡舜宏
objective: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
schedule:
1. Modeling and T-S (Takagi-Sugeno) Fuzzy Model
1-1 How to transform a nonlinear model to a T-S Fuzzy Model
2. Introduction of PDC (Parallel Distributed Compensation)
2-1 What is PDC?
2-2 LMI-Based Design Approach
2-3 Stable Controller Design via LMI
3. LMI Control Performance Conditions and Design
Stability Conditions
Stable Controller Design
4. Robust Fuzzy Control Fuzzy Model
4-1 Robust Fuzzy Control Fuzzy Model with Uncertainty
4-2 Robust Stability Condition
4-3 Robust Stabilization
4-4   Problem
5. Optimal Fuzzy Control
5-1 Quadratic Performance Function and Stabilization
5-2 Optimal Fuzzy Control Design
5-3 Robust-Optimal Fuzzy Control Problem
6.Fuzzy Observer Design
6-1 Fuzzy Observer
6-2 Design of Augmented System
7. Fuzzy Control of Nonlinear Time-Delay Systems
7-1 T-S Fuzzy Model with Time-Delay
7-2 Stability Analysis
7-3 PDC Control for T-S Fuzzy System with Time-Delay
8 Examples
8-1 Inverted Pendulum on Cart
8-2 Chaotic Model
8-3 Truck-Trailer Example
8-4 CSTR Example
8-5 Van de Vssue Example
scorePolicy: 1.期中考20% 2.期末考 20% 3.論文研讀書面報告 30% 4.程式報告 30%
materials:
1. Fuzzy control system design and analysis, John Wiley and Sons, Inc. Tanaka, Kazuo, 2001
2. 上課講義
